page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5ws_SecurityActive([* localrequest [,* r ]])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = Web security is active in the current web security settings. .F. = Web security is not active in the current web security settings.

argument.name: localrequest
argument.description: The Request system variable. This variable explicitly passes all request variables to the function.

page.description: Determine if web security is active. Used only in web pages and components
page.discussion: Determine if web security is active. May be used on A5W pages and web components in web applications only.

section.description: This code can be added to a web page to show a message about the security status.
section.example: <%a5 if A5WS_SecurityActive(request) then ?"Security is Active" else ?"Security is Not Active" end if %>

see.ref: Determine if web security is active
